body.bibl: Takahashi, Hidemi. “Transcription of Syriac in Chinese and Chinese in Syriac Script in the Tang Period.” In Scripts Beyond Borders: A Survey of Allographic Traditions in the Euro-Mediterranean World, edited by Johannes den Heijer, Andrea B.
